name: For Ida (prototype)
description:
"For Ida" is a 2D puzzle adventure for grownups that are a child at heart! I made this fairytale game for my bachelor thesis. It's about 15' minutes of playtime and is only part of a whole game! 

I want to continue to finish the whole game and am very happy if you play it and leave me some comments! It's not perfect yet :P
